###The Economist: Rwanda’s Eternal President
<iframe allowfullscreen="true" allowtransparency="true" frameborder="0" height="315" scrolling="no" src="https://www.facebook.com/plugins/video.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2FTheEconomist%2Fvideos%2F10155706808419060%2F&show_text=0&width=560" style="border:none;overflow:hidden" width="560"></iframe>

Great example of how you can tell a complete story in just a few minutes.
